name: Button man
descriptions: Button men are a type of Omerta thug found in Gomorrah in 2281.
Button men are trigger men when Big Sal and Nero have their meeting with Cachino during the quest How Little We Know.
Button men appear only in Fallout: New Vegas.
The term "button man" is used by the Italian-American mafia as another name for a soldato or "made man". The idea is that that in theory, when the boss pushes a button, someone dies.
